title:
# Django MVT Architecture
## Fundamentals and Best Practices

questions.question:
Looking at this MVT Architecture diagram:

![MVT Flow](https://media.geeksforgeeks.org/wp-content/uploads/20211122171829/nikhilimagereedit.jpg)

What's missing in the data flow? How would you improve it?

Review this Django model:
```python
class Order(models.Model):
    customer = models.ForeignKey(Customer)
    items = models.ManyToManyField(Product)
    total = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10)
```
Identify three potential issues and suggest improvements.

Common authentication methods in Django:
- Session-based
- Token-based
- Basic auth

Which modern authentication method is missing? Why is it crucial?
